actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Regulation and Conservation

official_title: A bill to amend the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act.
short_title: Petroleum Marketing Practices Amendments Act of 1991

summary.text: Petroleum Marketing Practices Amendments Act of 1991 - Amends the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act to modify the definition of "contract" to include any contract between specified parties which is economically necessary to the operation of the franchise. Provides that the termination or non-renewal of a franchise relationship, upon expiration of an underlying lease for marketing premises, is reasonable if specified conditions exist.

titles.title: Petroleum Marketing Practices Amendments Act of 1991
A bill to amend the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act.
